content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, thank you for showing interest in my apartment. I believe the rental price is negotiable, and I am open to discussing it with you. May I know your budget for a 25 square meter apartment in this area?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I will look into it and get back to you. Thank you for your time.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Of course, please take your time to consider the rental price. I am looking forward to hearing back from you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am sorry, I need a little more time. Can you give me a few days to think about it?

I understand that the rental price is negotiable, and I am willing to discuss it further with you. However, I need some time to consider my options and budget before making a final decision. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause, and I appreciate your understanding.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Certainly, I understand that you need some time to consider your options. Please feel free to take a few days to think about it. If you have any questions or need any clarification, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine
